select
from room where name like %#{word}%
mapper.insert: insert into room (id, name, type, building_id, floor_id, area_coords, description, img_url) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{buildingId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{floorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{areaCoords,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{imgUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
